SIMSSNR 1.0.0 documentation

input_parser module

input_parser module¶

input_parser.py

This module provides functionality for parsing command-line arguments and reading configuration files for the Structured Illumination Microscopy (SIM) GUI application.

Classes:

ConfigParser: Handles argument parsing and configuration loading.

class input_parser.ConfigParser[source]¶

Bases: object

Parser for command-line arguments and configuration files.

Handles parsing of input arguments for GUI initialization and configuration loading.

parser¶

The argument parser instance.

Type:

ArgumentParser

args¶

Parsed command-line arguments.

static read_configuration(file)[source]¶

Read and load a configuration file as a module.

Parameters:

file (str) – The name of the configuration file.

Returns:

The loaded configuration module.

Return type:

module
